update tcm_mris_base_info set is_upload_insure ='1' where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and id =#{id}
update emr_patient set emr_insure_upload ='1' where hosp_code =#{hospCode} and visit_id =#{id}
mapper.select: select mid.id, mid.hosp_code, mid.mbi_id, mid.disease_icd10, mid.disease_icd10_name, mid.visit_id, idm.insure_illness_code diag_code, idm.insure_illness_name diag_name, in_situation_code as adm_cond, mid.disease_code as maindiag_flag from mris_inpt_diagnose mid left join insure_disease_match idm on mid.hosp_code = idm.hosp_code and idm.hosp_illness_code = mid.disease_icd10 WHERE mid.visit_id = #{visitId} and mid.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and idm.insure_reg_code = #{insureRegCode} order by mid.disease_code desc

select columns_num as oprn_oprt_sn, moi.id, moi.oper_disease_name as oprn_oprt_name, moi.oper_disease_icd9, moi.oper_time as oprn_oprt_date, '' as anst_way, (select prac_certi_no from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and oper_doctor_id = su.id) as oper_dr_code, moi.oper_doctor_name as oper_name, (select prac_certi_no from sys_user su where su.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and ana_id1 = su.id) as anst_dr_code, moi.ana_name1 as anst_dr_name, moi.oper_time as oprn_oprt_date, idm.insure_illness_code as oprn_oprt_code, oper_code as oprn_lv_code, oper_name as oprn_lv_name, assistant_name1 as asit_1_name, assistant_name2 as asit_name2, heal_name as sinc_heal_lv, heal_code as sinc_heal_lv_code, ana_name as anst_mtd_name, ana_code as anst_mtd_code, ana_name1 as anst_dr_name, oper_position as oprn_oper_part_code, oper_position_name as oprn_oper_part, oper_code as oprn_lv_code, oper_name as oprn_lv_name from mris_oper_info moi left join insure_disease_match idm on moi.oper_disease_id = idm.hosp_illness_id and idm.hosp_code = moi.hosp_code where moi.visit_id = #{visitId} and moi.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and idm.insure_reg_code = #{insureRegCode} and idm.audit_code = '1' order by moi.columns_num asc

select mid.id, mid.hosp_code, mid.mbi_id, mid.disease_icd10, mid.disease_icd10_name, mid.visit_id, idm.insure_illness_code diag_code, idm.insure_illness_name diag_name, in_situation_code as adm_cond, mid.disease_code as maindiag_flag from tcm_mris_diagnose mid left join insure_disease_match idm on mid.hosp_code = idm.hosp_code and idm.hosp_illness_code = mid.disease_icd10 WHERE mid.visit_id = #{visitId} and mid.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and idm.insure_reg_code = #{insureRegCode} order by mid.disease_code desc
